biotools.summary: MzVar is a Java tool allowing the compilation of customized variant protein and peptide databases in the FASTA format for database searching of MS/MS data, using a VCF file as variant input and a FASTA file as transcript input. The tool is compatible with transcript sequences retrieved from either Ensembl or the UCSC Table Browser.

bioschemas.name: MzVar
